text: Isewal is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch S. Harinder Singh Sekhon of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India) Since 2018 dec till now. {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses||399|| || |- | Population ||2,080||1,098||982 |- |} ==Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil== ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Sahnewal Airport. ==References== Category:Villages in Ludhiana West tehsil
title: Isewal
